amendment.description: To provide for a report on certain programs of the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1159 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1159 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6313) To provide for a report on certain programs of the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1159 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1159 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 948.
